column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ At 4:17 am on May 17
column5: at Koh Pich Bridge in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column7: four Chinese people in a Mazda ended up in the river.------The car was severely damaged but teh crash did not cause injuries.------Before the incident
